name: BAIV VSOM Ontology
description: Complete VSOM ontology for Be AI Visible platform defining the structure and relationships of strategic framework components including value proposition, market strategy, objectives, and success metrics
oaa:domain: AI Visibility, Marketing Technology, SaaS Platform, Strategic Management
author: Milana Thornton

creator.name: Be AI Visible
creator.description: AI Visibility optimization platform helping businesses get recommended by ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, and Gemini

entities.name: VSOMFramework
entities.description: Complete Vision-Strategy-Objectives-Metrics implementation framework defining how organizations establish strategic direction, competitive positioning, measurable goals, and success indicators. Driver is BusinessImpact, Goal is Outcomes, Measure is Value.

oaa:properties.name: frameworkId
oaa:properties.description: Unique identifier for VSOM framework instance

entities.name: VisionComponent
entities.description: Long-term aspirational direction aligned with organizational purpose, typically spanning 3-10 years, defining where the organization aims to be and what it represents in its market

entities.name: StrategyComponent
entities.description: Multi-layer strategic approach spanning corporate, marketing, operational, and digital strategies with 1-3 year time horizon, defining how organization will achieve its vision through competitive advantage and resource allocation

entities.name: ObjectivesComponent
entities.description: Specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, time-bound goals with quarterly to annual time horizon that cascade from strategy and drive organizational execution

entities.name: MetricsComponent
entities.description: Key performance indicators and measurement systems tracking value delivery with continuous monitoring, including thresholds for critical, warning, and target states

entities.name: PainPointsContext
entities.description: Validated customer pain points derived from market research, customer interviews, and user feedback that inform value proposition and strategic positioning

entities.name: ICPContext
entities.description: Ideal Customer Profile context defining target customer segments, their characteristics, pain points, and value alignment with strategic objectives

oaa:properties.name: primaryICPs
oaa:properties.description: List of primary ideal customer profiles

entities.name: CompetitiveContext
entities.description: Competitive landscape analysis including direct competitors, their positioning, strengths, weaknesses, market window, and defensive moat strategy

oaa:properties.name: directCompetitors
oaa:properties.description: List of direct competitors with analysis

relationships.name: hasVision
relationships.description: Relates VSOM framework to its vision component defining long-term aspirational direction

relationships.name: hasStrategy
relationships.description: Relates VSOM framework to one or more strategy components defining execution approach

relationships.name: hasObjective
relationships.description: Relates VSOM framework to one or more objectives components defining measurable goals

relationships.name: hasMetric
relationships.description: Relates VSOM framework to one or more metrics components defining success measurement

relationships.name: hasPainPointsContext
relationships.description: Relates VSOM framework to customer pain points context informing value proposition

relationships.name: hasICPContext
relationships.description: Relates VSOM framework to ideal customer profile context defining target segments

relationships.name: hasCompetitiveContext
relationships.description: Relates VSOM framework to competitive landscape context informing strategic positioning

relationships.name: informsStrategy
relationships.description: Vision component informs and guides strategy development

relationships.name: definesObjectives
relationships.description: Strategy component defines specific objectives for execution

relationships.name: measuredBy
relationships.description: Objectives are measured by specific metrics

businessRules.name: Vision Must Have Time Horizon
businessRules.description: IF VisionComponent exists THEN visionHorizon must be defined with minimum 1 year duration
businessRules.action: THEN visionHorizon must be defined with minimum 1 year duration
businessRules.rationale: Vision without time horizon lacks strategic clarity and cannot guide long-term planning

businessRules.name: Strategy Must Align With Vision Horizon
businessRules.description: IF StrategyComponent exists THEN strategy timeline must fall within VisionComponent time horizon
businessRules.condition: IF StrategyComponent exists AND VisionComponent exists
businessRules.action: THEN strategy timeline must fall within VisionComponent time horizon
businessRules.rationale: Strategy that exceeds vision horizon indicates misalignment between strategic and aspirational planning

businessRules.name: Objectives Must Have Deadlines
businessRules.description: IF ObjectivesComponent exists THEN deadline must be defined and in the future
businessRules.action: THEN deadline must be defined and in the future
businessRules.rationale: Objectives without deadlines lack urgency and cannot drive execution

businessRules.name: Objectives Must Have Measurable Targets
businessRules.description: IF ObjectivesComponent exists THEN targetValue must be defined and different from baselineValue
businessRules.action: THEN targetValue must be defined and different from baselineValue
businessRules.rationale: Objectives without measurable targets cannot be tracked or achieved

businessRules.name: Metrics Must Have Thresholds
businessRules.description: IF MetricsComponent exists THEN at least thresholdTarget must be defined
businessRules.action: THEN at least thresholdTarget must be defined
businessRules.rationale: Metrics without target thresholds lack clear success criteria

businessRules.name: Critical Objectives Require Critical Metrics
businessRules.description: IF ObjectivesComponent.businessImpact = 'Critical' THEN at least one related MetricsComponent must have businessImpact = 'Critical'
businessRules.action: THEN at least one related MetricsComponent must have businessImpact = 'Critical'
businessRules.rationale: Critical objectives without critical metrics cannot be properly monitored for business-critical issues

businessRules.name: Framework Must Have W4M Alignment
businessRules.description: IF VSOMFramework exists THEN driver must be 'BusinessImpact', goal must be 'Outcomes', and measure must be 'Value'
businessRules.action: THEN driver must be 'BusinessImpact', goal must be 'Outcomes', and measure must be 'Value'
businessRules.rationale: VSOM framework must align with W4M core principles: BusinessImpact drives Outcomes measured by Value

businessRules.name: Metrics Must Have Data Sources
businessRules.description: IF MetricsComponent.businessImpact = 'Critical' THEN dataSource must be defined
businessRules.rationale: Critical metrics without defined data sources cannot be reliably tracked

baivInstance.name: Be AI Visible - VSOM Framework
baivInstance.description: Complete strategic framework for Be AI Visible platform

VisionComponent.visionStatement: When businesses think 'how do I get recommended by AI', they think Be AI Visible. We own the AI Visibility category the way SEO owned Google rankings.
coreValues: Transparency - Make invisible customer journeys visible
Results - AI citations that convert 21x better aren't theory, they're proven
Speed - Discovery audits in 2.5 minutes, not 2 weeks
Intelligence - Multi-platform understanding, not single-platform tracking
Customer Success - Boots on the ground, not corporate playbooks
VisionComponent.aspirationalDirection: Be AI Visible becomes the standard platform for AI visibility optimization across all marketing teams - from solo founders to Fortune 500 CMOs. The category we create becomes as fundamental as SEO.
VisionComponent.purposeAlignment: Enable businesses to thrive in the AI-mediated discovery era by revealing and optimizing the customer journeys happening inside AI conversations
VisionComponent.marketOpportunity: 40% of purchase decisions now happen in AI conversations before any click. Traditional analytics are blind to this. We make it visible and optimizable.

StrategyComponent.name: AI Visibility Category Creation
StrategyComponent.description: Create and dominate 'AI Visibility Optimization' as a recognized category distinct from SEO, before traditional SEO tools commoditize basic AI tracking
StrategyComponent.strategicThrust: First-mover advantage in AI visibility before SEMrush/Ahrefs add basic AI citation tracking (12-18 month window)
StrategyComponent.competitiveAdvantage: Multi-platform testing (ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Gemini) + Not just scores but actionable implementation + Understanding customer journeys in AI conversations

StrategyComponent.name: Ontology-Driven Platform Architecture
StrategyComponent.description: Build platform that semantically understands AI visibility, enabling 10x faster feature development and trivial white-label deployment
StrategyComponent.strategicThrust: Platform that 'knows' WHY features exist, not just WHAT they do - enabling rapid feature generation and instant white-label capability
StrategyComponent.competitiveAdvantage: Feature development in 15 minutes (vs 2-3 hours manual) through ontology-driven scaffolding

StrategyComponent.name: Discovery Audit as Growth Engine
StrategyComponent.description: Free/low-cost discovery audit generates qualified pipeline by demonstrating immediate value
StrategyComponent.strategicThrust: 2.5-minute audit creates instant value demonstration, converting cold prospects into qualified leads
StrategyComponent.competitiveAdvantage: Speed (2.5 minutes vs weeks) + Actionable insights (not just a score) + Immediate competitive context

ObjectivesComponent.name: Revenue Growth - Agency + Platform Scale
ObjectivesComponent.description: Scale from 6 agency clients and 0 platform subscribers to 58 agency clients and 1,000 platform subscribers

ObjectivesComponent.description: Launch production-ready platform with Discovery & Ongoing Intelligence capabilities

ObjectivesComponent.name: Client Success Validation
ObjectivesComponent.description: Prove product value through consistent client success: 3x citation increase driving measurable conversion improvement

ObjectivesComponent.name: BAIV's Own AI Visibility
ObjectivesComponent.description: Practice what we preach - achieve 50+ AI visibility score for BAIV itself

ObjectivesComponent.description: Build audience and educate market on AI visibility opportunity
